html: <tooldrawer-field type='choice-tiles' size='md' path='timer.mode' label='Select timer type' value='{{timer.mode}}' options='[{"label":"Countdown to Date","value":"date","icon":"calendar"},{"label":"Personal Countdown","value":"personal","icon":"person"},{"label":"Number Counter","value":"number","icon":"plus"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.targetDate' label='Target date & time' value='{{timer.targetDate}}' placeholder='2026-01-20T12:00' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.timeAmount' label='Time amount' value='{{timer.timeAmount}}' placeholder='10' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.timeUnit' label='Time unit' value='{{timer.timeUnit}}' options='[{"label":"Hours","value":"hours"},{"label":"Minutes","value":"minutes"},{"label":"Days","value":"days"},{"label":"Weeks","value":"weeks"},{"label":"Months","value":"months"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='timer.repeat' label='Repeat' value='{{timer.repeat}}' options='[{"label":"Never","value":"never"},{"label":"1 minute","value":"1 minute"},{"label":"5 minutes","value":"5 minutes"},{"label":"1 hour","value":"1 hour"},{"label":"1 day","value":"1 day"},{"label":"1 week","value":"1 week"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.targetNumber' label='Target number' value='{{timer.targetNumber}}' placeholder='100' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.startingNumber' label='Starting number' value='{{timer.startingNumber}}' placeholder='0' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='timer.countDuration' label='Count duration (seconds)' value='{{timer.countDuration}}' placeholder='10' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' path='timer.headline' label='Headline text' value='{{timer.headline}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='layout.width' label='Content width' value='{{layout.width}}' options='[{"label":"Auto","value":"auto"},{"label":"Full","value":"full"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' path='appearance.background' label='Widget background' value='{{appearance.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.textColor' label='Text color' value='{{appearance.textColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='md' allow-image='false' path='appearance.timerBoxColor' label='Timer box color' value='{{appearance.timerBoxColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' value='{{behavior.showBacklink}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.during.type' label='Action type' value='{{actions.during.type}}' options='[{"label":"Link","value":"link"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.url' label='URL' value='{{actions.during.url}}' placeholder='https://example.com' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.during.text' label='Button text' value='{{actions.during.text}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.during.style' label='Button style' value='{{actions.during.style}}' options='[{"label":"Primary","value":"primary"},{"label":"Secondary","value":"secondary"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='actions.during.newTab' label='Open in new tab' value='{{actions.during.newTab}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='actions.after.type' label='Action type' value='{{actions.after.type}}' options='[{"label":"Hide Timer","value":"hide"},{"label":"Link","value":"link"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.url' label='URL' value='{{actions.after.url}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' path='actions.after.text' label='Message text' value='{{actions.after.text}}' show-if="actions.after.type == 'link'" />
